00023 #ifndef _BUS_COMMANDS_H_
00024 #define _BUS_COMMANDS_H_
00025 
00026 //Commands which are from 0xC0 to 0xEF are reserved for internal communication commands
00027 
00029 #define BUS_CMD_ACK     0xFA
00030 
00031 #define BUS_CMD_NACK    0xFB
00032 
00035 #define BUS_CMD_SYNC    0x01    
00036 
00037 #define BUS_CMD_PING    0x02    
00038

00041
